## Welcome!

I am currently a Postdoc working on the [DEMCOOP-project](https://www.su.se/english/research/research-catalogue/research-projects/b/democracy-autocracy-and-international-cooperation-demcoop) at Stockholm University. Previously, I worked at the University of Oslo, where I received a PhD for my dissertation "Patterns of minister turnover across regime types" in 2024.

My current research focuses primarily on **the effects of regime type on international cooperation**, **the interplay of political institutions and elites**, and **autocratic politics**. My work on these topics has been published in journals such as *Perspectives on Politics*, *Democratization*, and *Political Studies.*

### Interests

-   Political elites
-   Autocratic politics
-   International cooperation
-   Democratic breakdown and resilience
